p: All CCC separations were carried out using a TBE 300C HSCCC system (Tauto Biotech. Co., Ltd., Shanghai, China) with three preparative coils (diameter of tube: 2.6 mm; total volume: 300 mL). An Isolera FLASH purification system (Biotage, Uppsala, Sweden) was equipped with the HSCCC system as a pump, a UV monitor, and an auto fraction collector.
